title: The Navigator (1924 Comedy) Directed by Donald Crisp and Buster Keaton | Silent Film

sources.title: The Navigator (1924 Comedy) Directed by Donald Crisp and Buster Keaton | Silent Film
sources.description:
Rollo Treadway (Buster Keaton), a clueless aristocrat, and Betsy O’Brien (Kathryn McGuire), a pampered heiress, bumble through nautical chaos aboard a derelict ship, dodging rogue octopi and improvising swordfish duels while fending off a Cannibal Chief (Noble Johnson). Keaton’s deadpan genius and McGuire’s comic panic collide as they outwit sinking hulls and torpedo-toting subs, capsizing their misadventures with a slapstick splash.

Original Title: The Navigator

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/mBV-9dRMXKg


Directors: Donald Crisp, Buster Keaton
Writers: Clyde Bruckman, Joseph A. Mitchell, Jean C. Havez
Stars: Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Frederick Vroom
Genres: Silent Film, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Romance


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdaJH0KLX-XW_DSPIz94iorK
